definition[0]: deliberately done in a particular way, or made to have particular qualities
example[0]: a test held under controlled conditions
definition[1]: limited by a law or rule
example[2]: Access to the site is closely controlled.
example[3]: a police search for controlled drugs  (=a drug that is illegal to have without permission from a doctor)
definition[2]: calm and not showing emotion, even if you feel angry, afraid etc
